channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 5 Best Lip Balms to Try in 2025, All Tested in Tough Conditions
item.description: If your lip balm makes you need more lip balm, try our top picks instead.

item.title: Belkin is recalling thousands of charging banks and stands due to a fire risk – here's how to check your model
item.description: Belkin is recalling the Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro and the Belkin BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank 20K.

item.title: Pour l’avant Black Friday, le casque Bower & Wilkins Px7 S2e (avec Audio Lossless) lâche 190 € de son prix
item.description: Pour le Px7 S2e, Bowers & Wilkins a gardé la fiche technique de la première itération : 30 heures d’autonomie, réduction de bruit efficace, un confort de salon d’hôtel… sauf que cette fois, un DSP retravaillé vient affiner l’oreille. En ce moment, il s’affiche à 237,49 euros au lieu de 429 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Soundpeats Clip1 Review: These Affordable Open Wireless Earbuds Have Bose Beat
item.description: The Clip1 beat my favorite open-style wireless earbuds in the sound department and cost less than half the price.

item.title: Analog Photography: The Beginner’s Guide to Film Cameras (2025)
item.description: Which film camera should you get? Which films are the best? We demystify the world of analog photography to help you get started.

item.title: Framework’s franken-laptop is back with big chip upgrades and familiar frustrations
item.description: Framework did it again. It promised modular, upgradeable, and user-repairable laptops where other manufacturers dare not venture or have outright failed. And it's delivered. The 2025 version of the Framework Laptop 16 comes with not only new AMD Ryzen AI CPU options, but also Wi-Fi 7, a more powerful USB-C charger, redesigned cooling, and a […]

item.title: Wales vs Japan free streams: How to watch Autumn International 2025, TV Channels, Preview & Team News
item.description: All the ways to watch Wales vs Japan live streams online, with the 2025 Autumn International set to have major implications for the Rugby World Cup draw.

item.title: AI scams surge: how consumers and businesses can stay safe
item.description: AI scams are evolving fast. Deepfakes, voice clones, and QR phishing are just the beginning.

item.title: How to watch Brazil vs Senegal on ITVX — it's *FREE*
item.description: Here's a round up of how to watch the international friendly between Brazil and Senegal as the two face off at the Emirates Stadium.

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie: what we know so far about the new Nintendo film (release date, trailer, cast, plot)
item.description: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie is the next animated movie from Nintendo and Illumination – here's what we know so far.

item.title: Black Friday des PC portables : de la bureautique au gaming, MSI, Asus, Apple et d’autres défilent dans ces 13 offres de qualité
item.description: Besoin d’un nouvel ordinateur portable ? Que vous recherchiez une machine bureautique ou un modèle taillé pour le gaming, il y en a pour tous les goûts durant l’avant-première du Black Friday. Les marques phares comme Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI affichent déjà de belles réductions, pour tous les budgets et tous les usages.

item.title: Fnac et Darty cassent le prix de nombreux produits en ce week-end du pré-Black Friday et voici les 23 meilleurs
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday bat son plein chez les différents e-commerçants français. Évidemment, la Fnac et Darty sont de la partie pour vous faire de belles économies. Voici les meilleurs produits Tech en promotion que l’on recommande à cette occasion.

item.title: 11 Best Natural Deodorants I Tested for Daily Use (2025)
item.description: Want to go aluminum-free without being stinky? Native is our top pick as the best natural deodorant. Read our full thoughts on all the items we tested.

item.title: ChatGPT Achieves a New Level of Intelligence: Not Using the Em Dash
item.description: Humans can take it back.

item.title: On a testé le nouveau vélo électrique familial de Moustache : que demander de plus ?
item.description: Plus besoin de présenter Moustache. C'est la marque française iconique de vélos électriques créée en 2010. Aujourd'hui, c'est 180 emplois, plus de 70 vélos au catalogue et toujours le fameux guidon qui a fait son succès en forme de... moustache. En 2021, Moustache a lancé son premier vélo cargo : le lundi 20 Cargo. 4 ans plus tard, nous avons pu enfin tester sa nouvelle version. Que vaut ce nouveau modèle face à la concurrence ? La réponse dans notre test. ...

item.title: Polar Loop Review: Better Than a Whoop 5.0?
item.description: The new subscription-free fitness band is a solid competitor to Whoop, but with a big caveat.

item.title: The Steam Machine feels like the TV gaming PC I’ve always wanted
item.description: The morning of Monday, October 27th, I started my workweek by asking my colleagues at The Verge for advice on buying a gaming PC. I wanted a small, portable, and semi-powerful machine that could easily sit beneath my living room TV and occasionally move over to my desk to play games or even use for […]

item.title: Pluribus’ third episode throws a bomb into things
item.description: If you weren't clear on just what a miserable person Carol (Rhea Seehorn) is, episode 3 of Pluribus sure makes it obvious. It opens with a flashback, as Carol and her partner Helen (Miriam Shor) are on a dream vacation at an ice hotel in Norway, and all she can do is complain about how […]

item.title: Samsung's Black Friday sale is live: get the lowest prices all year on Galaxy S25 Ultra, OLED TVs, appliances, and more
item.description: Samsung's massive Black Friday sale has just been launched: here are the 14 best deals on everything from high-end TVs to vacuum cleaners.

item.title: Yeti just did the unthinkable: Hire an ad agency
item.description: Yeti built its cult brand all on its own. A new partnership with Wieden+Kennedy is a vote of confidence in the agency model—and Yeti’s own ambitions. Outdoors brand Yeti dropped its new holiday commercial, and it has a lot of what you’d expect from a seasonal spot. “Bad Idea” outlines all the reasons you probably shouldn’t get a Yeti for someone you care about: “Don’t get them a Yeti,” says the voice-over, as a ribboned cooler flies out the back of a pickup truck. “Unless you like dogs that are always wet, eyebrows that are still growing back, and sand in places sand should never be.”...
